text: @WhiteHouse Lies lies lies.  Everyday you and POTUS lie.   It’s shameful.  153,000 Americans are dead from Covid19 because of your weak leadership.   AND YOU STILL HAVE NO PLAN TO SLOW THE SPREAD OR A PLAN TO SAVE MORE AMERICANS FROM DYING.  WAKE UP.  YOUR ADMINISTRATION IS ABHORRENT
